snippet: As the lawsuit drags on, it could show how IMDb, Hollywood’s quasi-official record book, compiles the facts and figures by which entertainers are publicly defined.
abstract: Movie actress Junie Hoang is suing Internet Movie Database and its parent, Amazon.com, for disclosing her age in an online profile; lawsuit may show how IMDb, Hollywood's quasi-official record book, compiles the facts and figures by which entertainers are publicly defined.
lead_paragraph: As the lawsuit drags on, it could show how IMDb, Hollywood’s quasi-official record book, compiles the facts and figures by which entertainers are publicly defined.

headline.seo: Junie Hoang’s IMDb Lawsuit and Internet Privacy
headline.main: Actress’s Privacy Lawsuit Challenges a Web Site
headline.print_headline: Actress’s Privacy Lawsuit Challenges a Web Site
